review: Excellent for the money. It's not 5-star in my opinion simply because it lags a bit, and sometimes quite a bit, while scrolling between channels. But once you're on the content you've selected, it works like a champ. Excellent HD picture and a large selection of Amazon Prime (of course...) stuff, but also a lot of free channels for movies (Crackle) and streaming TV services (Sling TV). If you're looking to ditch the high-price of cable or satellite TV like I was, this is the way to go.
author: Phillip Withers "PapaGuk"
